description: While this program isn't perfect -- its UI is a bit cluttered -- it does the job of accessing the Soulseek peer-to-peer filesharing network, which focuses on audio files.
summary: Useful tool to access Soulseek network

description: This application is a near exact clone of the default Windows/Mac client for Soulseek. Though the interface could use some pruning, it works well in accessing the Soulseek P2P network.
summary: A great GTK alternative for P2P music

description:
If you can access your modem/router and do a port forwarding to map your public IP address with your private IP address, then this is for you. If not, Nicotine is not for you. 
In my case, I can't do the port forwarding, and Nicotine misbehave. If that's your case I recommend the original Soulseek, there is a guy who made a Flatpak that works like a charm, go to the official Soulseek page to find out more.
summary: Misbehaves if port forwarding is not implemented

description: Permite buscar y encontrar mucha musica
Certaines fonctionnalités ne fonctionnent pas (télécharger tout le dossier par exemple) mais ça reste tout à fait utilisable
summary: Super application, dommage qu'elle ne soit plus mise à jour!
